Posts.Content: Sep 2, 2009 11:32AM Kirky wrote: Lynne...do you have family history of BC?  I had a palpable lump and had a core biopsy on 8/12.  After those results, my surgeon said he "thought" it was just a form of lipoma (fatty tissue), but to be on the safe side he wanted to excise it and have the entire mass biopsied.  I thought that was strange...I figured the core biopsy would diagnose or rule out cancer alltogether.  I also have researched BC online waaaay too much.  I had the excision on 8/27 and went back to work on 9/01.  You are doing good by keeping ahead of the pain, I am sure everyone's is different.  My incision never gave me trouble just the soreness of the bruising.  I didn't receive a compression bra, but I did buy a leisure bra that fastens in the front...very comfortable and cheap...worked really well.  I, too, am waiting the full results....I hope we both receive good news soon.... Good luck! Kirky
Posts.Title: waiting for excisional biopsy results lynne2009 Kirky
